com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers
[Groovy] Enum DTPlusEnum

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum
      com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers.DTPlusEnum

enum DTPlusEnum
extends java.lang.Enum

brief:
An ENUM helper type that can plus/substract certain number of time units to a DateTime object;
Authors:
Janusz Kowalczyk

Constructor Summary
DTPlusEnum()

@brief Default constructor, it will use default values if no custom DateTime and formatPattern is set

@brief A simple function that will substract certain number of time units (millisecond, seconds, days, etc.) depending of current ENUM type

Setter for custom format pattern.

Method Detail

minus

java.lang.String minus(int i)
brief:
A simple function that will substract certain number of time units (millisecond, seconds, days, etc.) depending of current ENUM type
Parameters:
i - A number of time units that will be substracted from to current datetime depending od ENUM type
Returns:
A String representation of current datetime with number of time units substracted.

now

java.lang.String now()
brief:
Will return current DateTime formatted using current format pattern as String.
Returns:
A String representation of current DateTime.

plus

java.lang.String plus(int i)
brief:
A simple function that will add certain number of time units (millisecond, seconds, days, etc.) depending of current ENUM type
Parameters:
i - A number of time units that will be added to current datetime depending od ENUM type
Returns:
A String representation of current datetime with number of time units added.

Parameters:
dt - - A Joda's DateTime object

setFormatPattern

void setFormatPattern(java.lang.String fp)
brief:
Setter for custom format pattern. For more details please refer to: http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/format/DateTimeFormat.html
Parameters:
fp - - A String representation of format pattern
